Select /* DaSyncTablesMapper.xml/getSyncTableList - ns: DaSyncTablesMapper by rohys03 */ distinct SRC_DB sourceDb , TABLE_OWNER owner , TABLE_NM tableName , TRGT_DB targetDb , S.HOSTNAME hostname , T.UPDATE_DT updateDt from DAUSER.DA_SYNC_TABLES t, DAUSER.DA_SERVER_INFO s where 1=1
and TABLE_NM = #{tableName}
and UPPER(S.HOSTNAME) like '%'||#{hostName}||'%'
and t.TRGT_DB = s.SERVER_IP(+)

SELECT nvl(Logic_area_cd, 'Undefined') areaCd1, Logic_area_cd2 areaCd2,
Count(*) allInstanceCnt,
sum(decode(db_id, 1, 1, 0)) db1Cnt, sum(decode(db_id, 4, 1, 0)) db2Cnt, sum(decode(db_id, 5, 1, 0)) db3Cnt, sum(decode(db_id, 1, 0, 4, 0, 5, 0, 1)) otherInstanceCnt From dauser.da_tables Group by logic_area_cd, logic_area_cd2 Order by logic_area_cd nulls last, logic_area_cd2 nulls first

Select T.DB_ID dbId , T.OWNER owner , T.TABLE_NAME tableName , Trunc(Avg(INSERT_OCCR_CNT)) insertOccrCnt , Trunc(avg(UPDATE_OCCR_CNT)) updateOccrCnt , Trunc(avg(DELETE_OCCR_CNT)) deleteOccrCnt From DAUSER.DA_TABLES T, DAUSER.DA_TAB_MODIF M where 1=1 and T.db_id = #{dbId} and T.owner = #{owner} and T.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} and T.db_id = M.DB_ID and T.owner = M.OWNER and T.TABLE_NAME = M.TABLE_NAME and M.CLCT_DY >= to_Char(sysdate - 7, 'yyyymmdd') GROUP BY T.DB_ID, T.owner , T.TABLE_NAME

SELECT A.HGRNK_SUBJ_AREA_CD hgrnkSubjAreaCd , A.SUBJ_AREA_CD subjAreaCd , A.HGRNK_SUBJ_AREA_CD logicalAreaCd , A.SUBJ_AREA_CD logicalAreaCd2 , A.SUBJ_AREA_NM subjAreaName , A.SUBJ_AREA_ENG_NM subjAreaEngName , phscl_area_Cd phsclSubjAreaCd , AREA_DEPTH areaDepth , SUBJ_AREA_DESC subjAreaDesc , TABLE_CNT tableCount , SQL_CNT sqlCount FROM ( SELECT B.SUBJ_AREA_CD , COUNT(distinct Table_name) TABLE_CNT , COUNT(distinct sql_id) SQL_CNT , wm_concat(distinct phscl_area_Cd) phscl_area_Cd FROM DA_SQL_DEPENDENCY A, DA_TABLES B WHERE 1=1 AND A.CLCT_DY(+) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND A.OBJECT_NAME(+) = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.OWNER(+) = B.OWNER AND A.DB_NM(+) = 'TMALL' AND A.OBJECT_TYPE(+) ='TABLE' AND B.DB_ID = 1 Group by SUBJ_AREA_CD ) B, DA_TAB_SUBJ_AREA A WHERE A.SUBJ_AREA_CD = B.SUBJ_AREA_CD(+)
and (A.SUBJ_AREA_CD = #{subjAreaCd} OR A.HGRNK_SUBJ_AREA_CD = #{subjAreaCd})
and A.HGRNK_SUBJ_AREA_CD = #{hgrnkSubjAreaCd}
and A.USE_YN = 'Y' order by A.HGRNK_SUBJ_AREA_CD, AREA_DEPTH
